mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce the use of large files to improve load times and responsiveness on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider implementing lazy loading for images and videos to reduce initial page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta descriptions and ensure all images have alt text for better search engine indexing.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation further by reducing the number of clicks needed to access key information.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary form fields or adding autofill options.
tips: Implement more structured data for SEO to enhance visibility on search engines.
Improve page load time by optimizing resources like JavaScript and CSS.
